title: Litany To Mary (11 th Century Irish)
content:
THE LITANY TO MARY.
(11 th Century Irish)
Great Mary,
Pray for us.
Greatest of Marys,
Pray for us.
Greatest of Women,
Pray for us.
Mother of Eternal Glory,
Pray for us.
Mother of the Golden Light,
Pray for us.
Honour of the Sky,
Pray for us.
Temple of the Divinity,
Pray for us.
Fountain of the Gardens,
Pray for us.
Serene as the Moon,
Pray for us.
Bright as the Sun,
Pray for us.
Garden Enclosed,
Pray for us.
Temple of the Living God,
Pray for us.
Light of Nazareth,
Pray for us.
Beauty of the World,
Pray for us.
Queen of Life,
Pray for us.
Ladder of Heaven,
Pray for us.
Mother of God,
Pray for us.
